aiAgentsPage.title: Our AI Workforce
aiAgentsPage.description: Empower your business with our advanced AI solutions, designed to automate essential processes. This allows your team to focus on innovation while we handle the complex tasks

cta.title: Not sure which agent is right for your business?
cta.description: We analyze your current workflows and show you exactly which agents will increase your efficiency while saving you time and money.

order-confirmation.badge: AI Agent for Order Confirmation Checking
order-confirmation.title: Turn Every Order Confirmation into a Guaranteed Agreement
order-confirmation.subtitle: Prices, quantities, delivery dates – your AI Agent checks every line of every confirmation and compares it with the original order. No more silent errors, no more hidden losses, no more surprises for your customers.

capabilities.title: What the Order Confirmation Agent Does for You
items: Reads every incoming order confirmation – regardless of whether it comes as a PDF, email, attachment or via a portal.
Automated Comparison: Automatically compares the confirmation to the original order in your system, line by line.
Deviation Detection: Detects deviations in price, quantity, delivery date, item number, and more – even in complex documents.
Instant Alerts: Immediately alerts the right people so you can react before problems reach production or the customer.
Clear Documentation: Keeps a full record of every inspection, ensuring full transparency.
24/7 Reliability: Operates seamlessly day and night, ensuring all tasks are handled efficiently.

useCases.title: Where the Order Confirmation Agent Changes the Game

cards.title: Avoid Expensive Errors:
cards.body: Catch price shifts, missing inventory, and unapproved fees instantly, so you're never surprised by a costly invoice.

cards.title: Stabilize your supply chain and protect your planning
cards.body: Postponed deliveries and quietly shifted dates can throw off your entire production schedule. The AI Agent flags every changed delivery date and quantity immediately, giving you real planning security and fewer fire-fighting actions in purchasing, logistics, and production.

cta.title: Stop the silent thief in your order confirmations
cta.body: Unnoticed deviations in order confirmations steal money, time, and nerves every single day. The AI Agent for Order Confirmation Checking brings control and security back into your process – protecting your margins, your supply chain, and your customer relationships automatically.
cta.primary: Talk to us about this agent
cta.secondary: See how it fits your process

overview.title: Full Control
overview.description: Shift from invisible risks to visible data.

pdm.title: From Chaos to Compliance
pdm.subtitle: Say goodbye to spreadsheet struggles. Our AI Agent enforces rules, corrects data errors, and optimizes listings for platforms.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does For You
items: Error-Free Naming: Enforces clear rules for product titles, limits character count, and removes prohibited words.
Accuracy in Materials & Colors: Correctly lists materials and finishes, identifies surfaces.
Optimized Bullet Points: Creates a clear structure with bullet points: dimensions, versatility, materials, features, care instructions...
Technical & Visual Compliance: Identifies faulty sketches, ensures correct measurements, and checks file formats.
Product Variation Control: Ensures correct item grouping and prevents pricing or inventory errors.

useCases.title: Where the Product Data Management Agent Helps

cards.title: Stop Excel Hell and rejected uploads
cards.body: Automatically detect forbidden words, format issues, and validation errors before you upload — saving time and avoiding rejections.

cards.title: Get to market faster
cards.body: Accelerate listing creation by applying marketplace rules automatically and ensuring every listing is ready for upload on the first try.

cta.title: Ready to Optimize Your Listings?
cta.body: Stop worrying about broken macros and rejected listings. Let the Product Data Management AI Agent handle the details so your team focuses on growth.

content-generation.title: Unlimited, Marketplace-Ready Content in Minutes.
content-generation.subtitle: Good content sells – but writing it is slow. Every marketplace has strict rules for titles and bullets. This Agent creates optimized, compliant content for all your products in minutes instead of weeks.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Creates optimized titles, bullet points, and product descriptions for each marketplace.
Adapts wording and structure to platform rules (length, no promo words, etc.).
Generates SEO/GEO- friendly texts that are clear and easy to read.
Reuses templates so similar products get consistent content.
Creates content in multiple languages automatically.

cards.title: Speed to Market
cards.body: New products go live in hours, not weeks. Teams focus on assortment and strategy instead of copy-pasting bullet points.

cards.title: More Visibility, More Sales
cards.body: Algorithm-friendly text ensures higher rankings, while lower rejection risks keep your account safe and your listings active.

cta.title: Unlimited, marketplace-ready content
cta.body: You provide base data (attributes, materials, dimensions) – the Agent writes and adapts all content blocks for each sales channel automatically.

virtual-secretary.title: Your Never-Tired Digital Assistant.
virtual-secretary.subtitle: Phones ring, emails pile up, and customers expect instant answers. This Agent answers, sorts, and forwards requests before anyone in the office arrives, ensuring no opportunity is missed.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Answers calls and messages, collects key information, and routes them to the right person.
Books and confirms appointments, and sends automatic reminders.
Creates summaries of calls and emails directly in your CRM or ERP.
Handles routine questions automatically; forwards special cases to staff.
Works in multiple languages.

cards.title: No more missed customers
cards.body: Unanswered calls and late replies mean lost trust. This Agent ensures professional, consistent communication in every contact, day or night.

cards.title: Order instead of chaos
cards.body: Employees get pre-sorted, pre-qualified requests. This results in clear calendars, fewer coordination emails, and zero workflow interruptions.

cta.title: AI Secretary – Get started now, boost efficiency
cta.body: The Agent connects to your phone, email, and calendar tools and follows your rules on who should receive what. Works without vacation or sick days.

all-in-one.title: One Central AI Brain for Your Business.
all-in-one.subtitle: Knowledge is spread across ERP, CRM, email, and people’s heads. When someone leaves or is sick, processes slow down. This Agent connects all your systems to become the central brain that answers questions and guides every team.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Connects to ERP, CRM, email, shared folders, and knowledge bases.
Creates drafts for emails, offers, protocols, and reports.
Suggests next steps in processes and reminds teams of open tasks.
Stores and shares know-how so it never leaves the company.

cards.title: Faster Onboarding
cards.body: New colleagues usually need months to learn. With this Agent, they have an instant expert to ask, significantly reducing training time and errors.

cards.title: Stable Processes
cards.body: Processes often slow down when staff is sick or leaves. This Agent ensures consistent workflows and high-quality decisions regardless of staff fluctuation.

cta.title: Less searching, more doing
cta.body: The Agent becomes the first place to ask: employees write or speak their question, and it uses company data to answer and act immediately.

smm.title: Stay visible and engaged across all channels
smm.subtitle: Customers ask questions via Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and WhatsApp. Posts must be regular. This Agent plans content and answers instantly without needing a full social media team.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Plans, writes, and schedules posts across all major platforms.
Answers standard customer questions automatically (delivery time, stock, info).
Routes complex requests to the right team (sales, service, logistics).
Tags and forwards hot leads from comments directly into the CRM.
Monitors reactions and identifies trending topics.

cards.title: Active and Modern Brand Presence
cards.body: Your brand looks active and close to the customer. Consistent activity makes you look modern without the manual workload.

cards.title: Turn Comments into Sales
cards.body: Faster replies build trust. The Agent captures hot leads immediately, ensuring no sales opportunity is lost in the comments section.

cta.title: Auto-Reply
cta.body: Connect your social accounts; the Agent uses agreed content guidelines and workflows to post and respond automatically.

crm.title: Customer Contacts in One Place
crm.subtitle: Emails, phone notes, and Excel are often disorganized. This agent captures and synchronizes every lead to ensure no opportunity is missed.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Reads emails, forms, chat messages, and social media conversations.
Creates and updates contacts, tickets, and opportunities in your CRM automatically.
Connects CRM with ERP so customer, order, and service data match.
Flags urgent cases and assigns them to the right person.

cards.title: No more double work
cards.body: Eliminate manual data entry. With complete customer history, everyone sees the same picture, ending the chaos of scattered notes.

cards.title: Better Service, Better Data
cards.body: Faster responses and higher satisfaction. Plus, get reliable reporting and forecasting based on perfect, real-time data.

cta.title: Stop losing leads
cta.body: The Agent sits between your communication channels and CRM, continuously listening, matching, and updating records automatically.

order-processing.title: From Incoming Order to Clean ERP Entry.
order-processing.subtitle: Orders arrive as PDFs, Excel files, or emails. Manual entry is slow and error-prone. This Agent validates and enters every order into your ERP instantly, no matter the format.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Reads every incoming order, no matter the format or channel.
Transforms all data automatically into a structured, standardised format (EDI 2.0 ready).
Checks if data is complete and correct; asks for missing information within 30 seconds.
Writes the validated order directly into your ERP.
Works 24/7, even at peak times and weekends.

cards.title: Faster Delivery
cards.body: Orders are processed immediately, leading to earlier shipping times.

cards.title: Stop Typing Errors
cards.body: Eliminate manual data entry mistakes, drastically reducing returns and costly clarifications.

cta.title: Automate your order entry
cta.body: You forward all order channels to the Agent it extracts, validates, and imports orders automatically. No order is lost everything is traceable.

kitchen-order.title: Makes Complex Kitchen Orders Safe.
kitchen-order.subtitle: Kitchen orders are highly complex. A single wrong front can ruin the project. This Agent verifies every cabinet, front, and handle against the original plan to ensure what you ordered is what you get.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Reads detailed kitchen order confirmations with all positions and options.
Compares against the original plan and order (articles, sets, measurements, colours).
Highlights every deviation – even small ones – for quick review.
Differentiates between acceptable changes and critical errors.
Creates a clean summary for sales, production, and logistics.

cards.title: Perfect Deliveries
cards.body: Drastically fewer wrong or incomplete deliveries mean less rework, fewer on-site corrections, and zero complaints.

cards.title: Reliability & Trust
cards.body: Sales teams can promise reliability and keep it, building higher trust with kitchen studios and end customers.

cta.title: Your second set of eyes
cta.body: The Agent becomes your second set of eyes for every kitchen confirmation, checking all details before production starts.

edi.title: 100% Automated Transactions Between Partners
edi.subtitle: Traditional EDI is inflexible. This AI agent accepts documents in any format and automatically converts them to EDI 2.0, enabling transactions to be completed without manual intervention.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Accepts orders, confirmations, and other documents in any format (PDF, Excel, CSV, portal, email).
Converts everything into a clean EDI 2.0 structure that your systems understand.
Detects missing or inconsistent data and requests corrections automatically.
Keeps the process running – even when data is not perfect.
Integration via APIs into all ERP Systems.

cards.title: No Manual Firefighting
cards.body: End-to-end digital processes without manual intervention. The Agent translates and repairs data in real time so transactions never get stuck.

cards.title: Stable Scalability
cards.body: Stable automation even with many different partners and templates, creating a future-proof infrastructure for all your processes.

cta.title: Upgrade to EDI 2.0
cta.body: Fewer process errors, fewer delays, higher throughput. The Agent sits between your partners and your ERP to ensure smooth operations.

complains.title: Address complaints within 70 seconds
complains.subtitle: Handling complaints is slow, frustrating, and expensive. This Agent reads emails, analyzes photos, checks ERP data, and processes the claim helping you resolve issues quickly and turn unhappy customers into satisfied ones.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Monitors complaint inboxes and portals and picks up new cases instantly.
Reads emails and PDFs, extracts all relevant data (customer, order, product, reason).
Analyses attached images, detects damage type and identifies BFQ codes.
Checks assembly instructions and ERP data to verify the part and cause.
Fills the complaint in the ERP, triggers replacement orders, and sends confirmation.

cards.title: Speed That Satisfies
cards.body: Customers are calm and satisfied in under 2 minutes. Fewer escalations, fewer returns, and fewer negative reviews.

cards.title: Slash Process Costs
cards.body: A complete complaint handled in ~70 seconds instead of 60–90 minutes. Fully documented and legally safe processes.

cta.title: Speed up your service
cta.body: The Agent takes over from the moment a complaint arrives: it reads, checks, decides next steps, and updates ERP and customer automatically.

eudr.title: Protect Your Business from EUDR Penalties.
eudr.subtitle: New regulations like EUDR demand detailed proof of origin. Collecting this manually is impossible. This Agent collects and verifies supplier declarations automatically to ensure transparent, traceable supply chains.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Does
items: Collects and centralises supplier declarations, certificates, and product information.
Checks data completeness against EUDR requirements.
Flags risky or missing information and requests updates automatically.
Builds a clear chain-of-custody for relevant products.
Generates reports and documentation for audits.

cards.title: Avoid Fines & Blocked Goods
cards.body: Lower risk of fines and blocked products. Ensure clear proof of compliance for customers, partners, and authorities.

cards.title: Stronger Brand Positioning
cards.body: Less manual chasing of suppliers. Gain stronger sustainability positioning and trust by proving your supply chain is clean.

cta.title: Your digital compliance manager
cta.body: The Agent continuously gathers, checks, and updates all EUDR-relevant information, ensuring you are always audit-ready.

dpp.title: Prepare Today for Tomorrow’s Rules.
dpp.subtitle: The EU is introducing Digital Product Passports. Companies that start late will face high manual effort. This Agent builds structured data now to ensure compliance and avoid losing access to key markets.

capabilities.title: What This Agent Will Do
items: Collects and structures all information needed for DPP (materials, origin, repairs, recycling).
Ensures data is complete and in the correct format for upcoming standards.
Connects with suppliers and internal systems to keep passports updated.
Provides easy access to product passports for customers, partners, and authorities.

cards.title: Early Compliance
cards.body: Avoid high manual effort and risk of lost market access. Lower future workload by building structured data now before the new rules drop.

cards.title: Competitive Advantage
cards.body: Transparent, high-quality product information creates a strong basis for circular business models and sustainability initiatives.

cta.title: Future-proof your data
cta.body: This Agent will extend your existing data and compliance agents, using the same infrastructure to build and maintain Digital Product Passports automatically.
